data.name: FINAL FANTASY XIV: A Realm Reborn Free Trial
data.detailed_description:
FINAL FANTASY® XIV: A Realm Reborn™ is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) that invites you to explore the realm of Eorzea with friends from around the world.

In the updated Free Trial version of the FINAL FANTASY XIV, you’ll now be able to play as your favorite FINAL FANTASY class up to level 35.
Form a party and adventure with a multitude of players from across the globe.
Forge friendships, mount chocobos, and board airships as you and your companions create your own unique stories in Eorzea.
Set out alone or enlist the aid of friends as you undertake epic quests, battle familiar FINAL FANTASY monsters, and acquire unique abilities and equipment.
All the classic elements from the series that you have come to know and love are waiting!

Embark on the adventure of a lifetime to help reforge the fate of Eorzea.

data.short_description: FINAL FANTASY® XIV: A Realm Reborn™ is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) that invites you to explore the realm of Eorzea with friends from around the world.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“one of the most enchanting MMORPG settings ever.”
39 / 40 – 週刊ファミ通

“a great MMORPG experience”
8.6 / 10 – IGN

“One of the best takes on the MMO experience I’ve ever seen”
92 / 100 – Ten Ton Hammer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® Vista 32/64bit, Windows® 7 32/64 bit, Windows® 8 32/64 bit, Windows® 8.1 32/64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® Geforce® 8800 or higher, ATI Radeon™ HD 4770 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 26 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound® compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5　2.66GHｚ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® Geforce® GTX 660 or higher, AMD Radeon™ HD 7950 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 26 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound® compatible sound card
